# captureDevicePosition

**Instance Property**

The position of the capture device.

## Declaration

```swift
var captureDevicePosition: AVCaptureDevice.Position { get }
```

## Inspecting the video source

- **AVCaptureDevice.Position**: Constants that indicate the physical position of a capture device.
- **captureDeviceType**: The camera that supplies the video format.
